abstract: For the oil giant PetroChina, a share listing in Shanghai will raise money for a new pipeline and refinery, among other projects. For coal miner China Shenhua Energy, it means cash for possible mine acquisitions abroad.
lead_paragraph: For the oil giant PetroChina, a share listing in Shanghai will raise money for a new pipeline and refinery, among other projects. For coal miner China Shenhua Energy, it means cash for possible mine acquisitions abroad.

headline.main: In China, a Rush to Market
